Name: Matulizo's Group
description:
This season is not the first one that Matulizo is working alongside One Acre Fund. He has been a member for a few years now, having joined the program in 2014 and, although he is the only person featured in the above picture, he is actually representing his group of eight farmers in Kilolo North District, Tanzania.

Matulizo is often described by his community as a very friendly person and decided to be the one to represent his group because he wanted to spread the story of One Acre Fund farmers. Like many of his fellow farmers, Matulizo decided he wanted to be part of the One Acre Fund community in order to have access to quality training and acquire new farming methods and hopes to use the profits from this yearâ€™s harvest to repair his home.

This loan will not only help Matulizo but the whole group, who will receive maize seeds and fertilizer to plant a total of 5.5 acres of land. Additionally, some of the farmers in the group will be purchasing a solar light so, with this loan, the group will also receive a total of two solar lights.
